Recruitments 2015

Posted by Mobile Development Group, IIT Roorkee on February 4, 2015

List of selected candidates for Mobile Development Group

Here is the final list of candidates selected for Mobile Development Group,

  • Abhishek Sachdeva (ECE)
  • Akshay Kumar (META)
  • Amit Kumar (ECE)
  • Anshul Shah (CSE)
  • Karan Desai (EE)
  • Manthan Sheth (EE)
  • P Kinnera Priya (EE)
  • Raghav Chawla (ECE)
  • Shubham Kumar (EE)

Congratulations to all.
